markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 2"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Shooting Stars Stance](/Feats.aspx?ID=1737) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Monk" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=112" />
<trait label="Stance" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=152" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 128 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[Monastic Weaponry](/Feats.aspx?ID=434)

</column>

---

You enter a stance that lets you throw [shuriken](/Weapons.aspx?ID=79) with lightning speed. While in this stance, you can use your monk feats or monk abilities that normally require unarmed attacks with shuriken instead.
name: Shooting Stars Stance
